Course Description: Optimal control systems is a topic that is widely used in several fields’ like transportation, aerospace bio-informatics and economics. The goal of this course is to provide advanced knowledge in formulating an optimal control problem, analyzing its properties and then solving the problem using various linear and nonlinear optimization based techniques. The course is theoretical but has implementation and problem solving components.

Course Outcomes.CO1: Formulate an optimal control problem for different performance indices
Course Outcomes.CO2: Analyze the optimal control problem using variational approach and Pontryagin minimum principal
Course Outcomes.CO3: Solve optimal control problems using various open source solvers

Weekly Lecture Plan.Lecture Topic: Introduction – optimization, optimal control performance index

Resource Material.Textbook: Optimal control systems by Desinenu Subbram Naidu, CRC Press, 2009.
Resource Material.Reference: Optimal control theory: An introduction, Donald E. Kirk
